key.name: autostart
key.summary: Should Snippet Pixie autostart on log in?
key.description: If turned on, then Snippet Pixie will automatically start in the background when you log in to the desktop

key.name: auto-expand
key.summary: Should Snippet Pixie auto-expand typed abbreviations?
key.description: If turned on, then Snippet Pixie will monitor keystrokes in accessible applications and expand an abbreviation when its last character is entered

key.name: search-selected-text
key.summary: Should Snippet Pixie's search and paste search box be populated with selected text?
key.description: If turned on, when Snippet Pixie's shortcut is used to open the search and paste window, the last selected text will be used for the initial snippet search

key.name: focus-search
key.summary: Should Snippet Pixie's search and paste search box be focused when opened?
key.description: If turned on, when Snippet Pixie's shortcut is used to open the search and paste window, the search box will have focus and any initial search text will be selected
